name: Egg Hunt (itch) (Endercat Studios, Zilly)
description:
Find all the eggs! Install Instructions

Windows

  1. Download and extract zip file.
  2. Run Egg Hunt.exe

Mac

  1. Download and extract zip file.
  2. Open Egg Hunt
  3. Install

Linux

  1. Download and extract zip file.
  2. Run Egg Hunt.x86_64
